statements: DELETE FROM ResearcherData WHERE dataset_name = 'Data Set A';
DELETE FROM ResearcherData WHERE dataset_name = 'Observation Data' AND data_points < 1000;
DELETE FROM ResearcherData WHERE researcher_id = 7 AND mean > 50 AND (mode = 3 OR variance < 10);
DELETE FROM descriptive_stats WHERE mean < 50 AND std_dev > 10
DELETE FROM Datasets WHERE researcher_id = 1 AND id = 3;
DELETE FROM dataset_data WHERE dataset_id = 5 AND data_point > 100.5;
